item.title: By: Judith & Matt
item.dc:creator: Judith & Matt
item.description: <p>Have a fab time in Sweden make sure you say "hurdy gurdy" for me!!! We really enjoyed Norfolk shame we had to return to work. </p>
item.content:encoded: Have a fab time in Sweden make sure you say “hurdy gurdy” for me!!! We really enjoyed Norfolk shame we had to return to work.

item.title: By: Ed Brill
item.dc:creator: Ed Brill
item.description: <p>Well, I was in T2, not T1... not sure how big a difference that is. I connected through LHR last week on Sunday 5 March, and the flight connections centre had a ridiculously long queue as well.</p>
item.content:encoded: Well, I was in T2, not T1… not sure how big a difference that is. I connected through LHR last week on Sunday 5 March, and the flight connections centre had a ridiculously long queue as well.

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p> <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$FILE/wink.gif"</a>>Glad you got there safely. We all left this am and are safely home. Have a great time and hop the work goes well, too!! </p>
item.content:encoded: http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$FILE/wink.gif“>Glad you got there safely. We all left this am and are safely home. Have a great time and hop the work goes well, too!!
